MES_SAVE_OK:
You can now save data onto your adventure book!
ā
After saving, if you go back to the main title screen, you can bring your monsters from the DQMJ3!
REC_POINT_GR_09_02:
̄A celestial body that exists in the center of the world. 
There is no more data on it.
MES_NOCHO_TRIAL_010: You can now command your partner! On your bottom left screen....
MES_NOCHO_TRIAL_020: Touch this Nochorin icon or go talk to him and make your command.
NPC_SLIME_REC: ̄Monster with a blue, jelly-like body. Looks like it's always smiling.
DEAD_RETURN_MSG_01:
́You might need to slow down a bit... what happened to you!?
ā
Come back to Wood Park next time if you need to recover.
ā
We can't have you dying on us, you hear!?
DEAD_RETURN_MSG_01_SPEED: ́ȁ, are you okay? Let's get up and hurry off to Wood Park!
REC_ON_SYSTEM_INTRO: ̄This specific "Reactor" was created with the sole purpose of supporting you, and you alone.
REC_RA_MONS_MES:
̄An Insurgent Demon transformed by Mother's
rampage. It has an frightening amount of power.
DEAD_RETURN_MSG_02:
́Something must've gone wrong out there, but we got you back here before it was too late.
ā
The King wants you to hurry back. Get back out there after you recover!
DEVICE_MSG_001: The cage is already down on the ground.
DEAD_RETURN_MSG_02_SPEED:
́ȁ, are you okay?
ā
The King have returned and wishes to see you.Let's go to Wood Park to restore your energy!
MINE_MSG_001:
←　Glutton's Keep
Free the Nochoro Prisoners!
REC_POINT_GR_13_02: ̄A device that will activate Masters Road for those who wish to improve their riding technique.
MINE_MSG_002:
Someone, please, help my captured friends!
ā
... is what's written here.
RULER_POINT_MSG: ̄You've already attuned with this Zoom Stone.
DEMO_010_AFT_ORC_002:
́Boshock is always ready for a fight, and he's tough.
ā
If you find that you aren't ready to face him, don't be afraid to flee and train up a bit before you head back.
GREEN_RULER_MSG:
́A new Zoom Stone has been detected.
Attuning with the Zoom Stone for future access...
GREEN_RULER_MSG_2: The location "Glutton's Keep" is now an available location to zoom to!
DEMO_010_AFT_ORC_001:
́Boshock is currently the one in charge at Glutton's Keep!
ā
Be careful... we don't want you becoming bait like Nochiro did!
MINE_MSG_011: Use this Transportation Device to reach the Fallen City?Ă
STELE_MSG_005: ̄Please examine the Stone Monument ahead to obtain the Zoom ability.
DEMO_009_AFT_NOC_001:
́Huh!? What are you doing back here, ȁ!?
ā
I thought you headed out a while back to go fight that big monster!
ā
You mustn't be afraid to head into battle! After all, you're the only one with the power to save us!
DEMO_009_AFT_NOC_002:
́First, you simply touch an enemy on the field to enter into battle against it... but don't forget about scouting it!
ā
Beat it up just enough to show it how strong you are. At that point, you
should be able to scout it and have it join your team!
DEMO_009_AFT_NOC_004:
́To scout a monster, simply choose the "Scout" option from the menu during a battle!
ā
Your team will then attack the monster, demonstrating how strong they are together.
ā
If it is impressed by their strength compared to its own, then it will be inclined to join your team.
ā
But, if it doesn't join, don't be discouraged! There's always a chance of failure, so you'll just have to try again.
DEMO_009_AFT_NOC_005:
́Gahhh! What are you doing!? You've got to scout a monster!
ā
All you need to do is select that option from your menu during battle!
ā
DEMO_009_AFT_NOC_006:
́Then your monster team will demonstrate their power by attacking your opponent!
ā
If it finds your team's abilities to be impressive, it will join you and battle alongside you.
ā
But, if it doesn't join, don't be discouraged! There's always a chance of failure, so you'll just have to try again.
DONT_USE_TRANSFER_010: The Transporation Device is offline. You won't be able to use it at this time.
DEMO_009_AFT_NOC_003:
́Gahh! How did you lose again?!
ā
I'll heal your team one more time, but you have to get back in there and give it another go!
ā
You've got to befriend the monsters in order to get stronger as a Master!
DEMO_010_AFT_NOC: ́Hurry now. Everyone else went on ahead!
DEMO_025_AFT_KNG: ̅Ride the Bullfinch, leap across the cliffs, and attack that log. You think you can handle that, right?
REC_POINT_GR_01_02: ̄A village surrounded by large wooden walls. The Nochoro call this place their home.
DEMO_023_AFT_SYS:
You did it! You successfully scouted a Bullfinch!
Now, return to the Nochoro King and show him this monster.
NPC_ORC_REC:
̄Boshock used to be an Orc, prior to becoming
infected and becoming a Break Monster.
EVENT_IRREGULAR_MSG:
You still haven't scouted a Bullfinch.
ā
Please return once you've scouted a Bullfinch to continue.
SCENARIO_CLEAR_OPENSYSTM_001:
You've done it! You've successfully cleared the main story of the game!
ā
SCENARIO_CLEAR_OPENSYSTM_002:
You can now use the Fusion Machine to perform Super Fusions!
ā
Speak with Ace whenever you wish to give it a whirl!
SCENARIO_CLEAR_OPENSYSTM_003:
You can now exchange  Ultra-marbled Meat  at the Wi-Fi Square.
ā
When you obtain a  Ultra-marbled Meat Voucher , talk to Goldtanu at the Square.
NPC_KING_REC: ̄The King of the Nochoro species. Due to his oversized body, he cannot move without the assistance of his subordinates.
GIM_BOX_REC_01:
̄I'm detecting a form of life, from inside of the box.
Would you like to see what's inside?Ă
GIM_BOX_REC_02: The monster in the container started an attack!
REC_POINT_DRONE_HOLE_02: ̄It looks hollow inside. You can check it out using the drone.
NPC_NOCHO_MEN_REC: ̄A male of the Nochoro species. They are quite curious and friendly in nature.
NPC_NOCHORIN_REC: ̄A male of the Nochoro species. It seems to possess incredible speed for fleeing.
REC_ON_SYSTEM_EXPLAIN: ̄That concludes the tutorial on how to use your new Reactor! Now, it's time for you to go get your memories back!
NPC_BOSHOCK_REC:
̄The monster that keeps watch over Glutton's Keep.
Very fitting, too, as it's always hungry.
NPC_BIGHAT_REC:
̄Big Hats who are minions of Boshock. They aren't loyal, and follow him 
strictly out of fear.
NPC_MIMIZU_REC: ̄A huge worm that broke from the dark matter down deep in the grounds of the break world.
REC_POINT_GR_02_02:
̄A naturally formed rock archway rests in front of a fortress,
known simply as, Glutton's Keep.
REC_POINT_GR_03_02: ̄A sturdy steel birdcage. It's being used to hold the Nochoro hostage rather than house birds, however...
REC_POINT_GR_04_02: ̄A mechanical operating board used for manuvering the winch in Glutton's Keep.
REC_POINT_GR_05_02:
̄A water area, where lucky fairies go to rest their wings. 
It's referred to as a Fairy Fountain by the Nochoros.
REC_ON_SYSTEM_END:
̄Additionally, touching the button on the bottom-right part of the bottom screen will activate the Reactor "Search Mode".
ā
In this mode, you will see scannable objects. Upon scanning, more
information will be provided to help you on your journey.
ā
REC_POINT_GR_06_02: ̄A sign made by Nochoro. A tree in the distance was used to make it.
REC_POINT_GR_07_02: ̄A log that fell and rolled after hitting a tree root. Seems to have been caused by a large monster.
REC_POINT_GR_08_02: ̄Equipment used to transfer Masters between the different Realms. This one is connected to the Fallen City.
REC_POINT_GR_10_02: ̄A stone monument that has recorded a special technology that exists for use by Monster Masters.
REC_POINT_GR_11_02:
̄Attuning to this Zoom Stone will add it to your destination list.
These stones appear in various places around the world.
REC_POINT_GR_12_02: ̄The illusion of "paradise", where ȁ was in fact being detained from the real world.
REC_POINT_GR_14_01: ̄A mysterious Nochora who wanders around the break world.
REC_ON_SYSTEM_WELCOME:
̄Without further ado, welcome to the Reactor Support System, created to help guide you along on your latest journey!
ā
REC_ON_SYSTEM_ACT: ̄... This area is now being scanned, and an incomplete map of it will now be added to your bottom screen.
REC_ON_SYSTEM_RENEWAL: ̄A "NEXT" marker has also been set on the map. These will show you where to head to advance the story of your journey.
REC_RA_DOOR_011:
̄A door leading to another world. It was discovered
by in the Mirror of Ra's reflection, which shows the truth.
REC_RA_DOOR_030: They don't appear to have any significance at this time...
